Please don’t create multiple threads on the same topic

Resons for my team why to stay with solidworks SolidWorks
Hi, some members of my team want to change solidworks with onshape. Here is some background: In this season we we didnt had experience with sckeching and me and my friend learnd a lot and we gain a lot experience with solidworks. Now some members of the team want to move to onshape. Pls give me reasons why to stay with solidworks

From the rules https://www.chiefdelphi.com/faq

Don’t cross-post the same thing in multiple topics.

One way to improve the discussion is by discovering ones that are already happening. Spend time browsing the topics here before replying or starting your own, and you’ll have a better chance of meeting others who share your interests.
